title: Chapter I. Of Golden Walter and his Father

book.title: The Wood Beyond the World
book.description: 简介： Awhile ago there was a young man dwelling in a great and goodly city by the sea which had to name Langton on Holm. He was but of five and twenty winters, a fair-faced man, yellow-haired, tall and strong; rather wiser than foolisher than young men are...
